name: Science Out of Control
description:
This game was made in 48 hrs for the GMTK gamejam.
The jams theme was 'Out of Control' so in this game a sticky self replicating substance has spread in a research lab and the player has to reach the core of the facility equiped with a cleaning gun to stop the further production of this research experiment out of control.

For a visually optimal experience please use the desktop version ;)

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

RMB - Shoot water to fight the substance

LMB - Pick up cubes for some companionship ;)
